definition[0]: if you are assailed by unpleasant thoughts or feelings, they worry or upset you
example[0]: Carla was suddenly assailed by doubts.
explanation[0]: Assail is usually passive in this meaning
definition[1]: if a strong smell or loud sound assails you, you suddenly experience it
example[1]: The smell of rotten meat assailed her nostrils.
definition[2]: to attack someone or something violently
definition[3]: to criticize someone or something severely
